lines.text:
[Watching the workers pouring liquid rubber]
Why, it's milk.
Oh no, just rubber. But you could drink it if you care to stretch a point.
Oh, I once knew a man who made a joke like that. He was run over by a truck.
Well, you're out of luck here. We only have ox-cars and every ox knows me personally.
If it was the summer of 1894, I'd play games with you, sister. But life is much simpler now.
All right. If that makes you feel any better.
Don't you think I could be happy?
Would you mind if I made it my job to see that you are?
You can check the wings and halo at the desk.
That's a... a very polished little speech for a... barbarian.
I thought we might run up a few curtains and make a batch of fudge while we were planning on what to wear to the country club dance Saturday night.
